text: i want people to know that
ricky brewster is a christian
and he loves his wife just two days
after an unimaginable tragedy struck his
family ricky brister says his wife
darlene was dealing with mental health
issues when it happened i know it was a
mental health situation we were trying
to get help police responded to their
house in rockmart on friday night after
getting a call that someone was trying
to stab people inside their home while
it was on fire two children died at the
house a third at the hospital on
saturday his wife darlene is charged
with their children's murder there is no
hate towards her i mean i'm definitely
definitely hurt by what she did
but
i still
have to move forward ricky says he
doesn't know what will happen with them
as a couple rookie do you forgive your
wife
she was forgiven already he hopes the
rest of the world could also show her
forgiveness i want people to love people
like christ love the church
and forgive them have open heart and
compassion and if he could say one thing
to her i could talk to her
i want her to know that i still love her
i would like for her to know that
i would like for her to get the help
that she needs brister says now he is
living for the children he has left
